cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY' S GOVERNMENT.)SECRET.CP. 159 (;32)COPY NO.aCABINET.PALESTINE - GOVERNMENT POLICY.NOTE BY THE SECRETARY OP STATE FOR THE COLONIES,flth reference to Cabinet 27 (32) Conclusion 12,of 11th M-ay, I am glad to report that the High Commissionerfor Palestine has agreed to the course which I proposed,and which the Cabinet has approved, with regard to thepublication of the reports of the Director of Development,(Inlt.) P. G.-L.Colonial Office, 13th May, 1932.
